phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Show me who you really are!
The Queen of Witches released Asta's limiter suppressing his anti-magic
It feels like I am in a cold lake.
I assumed that you might be one of their kin,
A sudden mutation kept mana from dwelling in you.
But because of that, you are able to wield that sword.
But that is exactly what makes you special.
Asta was able to defeat Ladros, thanks to this newly awakened power,
and Ladros turned over a new leaf.
From now on, you will spend your life in my employ, working as my blade.
The Queen of Witches was after Asta's anti-magic all along.
She then took control of Asta...
I shall force you to kill everyone here with your own two hands.
Which one of you shall I kill first?
I will start with you, little royal.
To think that a royal of the Clover Kingdom shall die by his sword.
So he is not completely under her control.
I will not let you kill me.
I am not going to let you kill me!
I will shake this flimsy spell off right this instant!
Puppet's Blood binds itself with the blood in your body and takes hold.
No matter how much you struggle, you will never undo it.
That goes for you as well, even if you do not have any magic.
I swear that I will never leave this forest again!
I will never disobey you again...
I will kill them here, perfectly,
to keep you from having any more foolish notions ever again.
My divinations told me, Vanessa will summon what you want
and return to the forest alive someday.
That is why I did not search very hard for you.
Granted, I did not think that what I wanted would be a human with anti-magic swords.
But what did you gain by going outside?
You formed trivial bonds with imperfect fools, and as a result,
you only brought about their deaths.
After all, you are my daughter.
I am... part of your family?
That town had really delicious cake.
Please let me out of here!
I do not want to be in here anymore!
I am so lonely all by myself!
How long do I have to stay in here?
This thread magic does not have the sort of incredible power you say it does!
Please, let me out of here!
You will one day have the power to control destiny.
It clearly says so in my divinations.
You asked how long you must stay in there, and I shall give you an answer.
I will not let you out of there
until you invoke the magic that allows you to control destiny.
If I am your family, let me out of here!
I will be the one to choose your destiny.
Please let me out of here!
I do not have... powers like that.
That cake shop ended up closing down.
There is a big town outside this forest,
and there are a lot of people who are not witches living there.
We have heard that story hundreds of times.
All the other witches go there to have fun, right?
Why do not you escape from this cage and go out there, too?
I cannot defy the Queen of Witches.
Do you want me to ask the Queen of Witches for you?
You are a doll that I created with my own magic.
If I cannot do it, neither can you.
This whole conversation is just you talking to yourself to begin with.
Hopefully you will be able to make some real friends someday.
I am going to be stuck like this forever...
It seems a bit noisy outside...
I am just doing some warrior training.
Why am I being chased around this forest just for being a guy?
I have never seen one before.
And that hysterical old hag is a tough cookie, damn it.
What the hell is this place, anyway?
What are you doing in a place like this?
The Queen has me locked up in here.
You are locked up in here?
So you are literally like a bird in a cage.
There is a huge hole in it now, so you can get out that way.
I will never be able to escape the Queen.
I am fated to stay here.
I am fated to stay here?
Like hell I am going to listen to'i am.
I will do what I want, even if I have to crush fate myself.
I am pretty sure I cannot beat that hysterical old hag right now, though.
So I am getting the hell outta here.
I am a bird trapped in a cage...
Which means that I should have wings.
I can fly through that big, blue sky.
What I obtained in the outside world was...
And right now, that family is about to be taken from me, right before my eyes!
If I cannot stop this, why do I even exist?!
If I truly have this power...
I did not visualize it taking this shape.
Did she finally discover the power to control fate?
Rue your sin in having underestimated the Queen of Witches.
I am perfection, and I shall ensure that it is fostered properly under my supervision.
I could have sworn that he cut down the royal girl.
Rue your sin in having underestimated the Queen of Witches.
Did not I just speak those words a few moments ago?
Was there some kind of mistake?
Then how about the cat itself?
Are you telling me my manipulation failed?
This truly is the power to control destiny.
In all likelihood, this magic changes
the destinies of the people the cat touches to the caster's advantage.
Vanessa herself probably did not see the fates where her companions were killed.
She is only seeing the attacks continue to miss against all odds.
This cat is both harmless and unavoidable.
I have been waiting for this moment.
I have waited so, so long.
Now both you and your magic belong to me.
That power best suits me because I am perfect.
Now, fate, align yourself with me!
There is nothing that my perfect magic cannot control!
So this is the power to control destiny that you were talking about.
I do not know much about this power yet,
but there is one thing I do know.
This magic only takes the side of myself and those I have a family bond with.
You and I have no bond.
Oh, my lovely princess, please marry me.
Yes, it has to be you.
You are almost as beautiful as the Queen of Witches!
Oh, I could never compare to her!
The Queen of Witches is so beautiful, kind, and beloved by all!
You are so elegant, kind, and proud, just like the great Queen of Witches.
Oh, I am so happy, my prince!
Man, it is so quiet around here without those knuckleheads around.
That means I can take a dump in peace.
But it is a little too quiet.
They would better get back soon.
Black Clover, Page 65: I am Home.
